trends: There have been 22 other sightings in Olympia
There were no other sightings in Olympia on or around June 4th 2013
divs: sighting detailsat 11:00 pm june 4 2013 while camping at millersylvania st. park a very bright blue\white light appeared at about 70 degrees overhead from the south west moving to the north east. the light appeared like the shape of a "casper the ghost". domed on top, draping cone like down into an edge that was wave like. as if cut with big pinking shears. up and down. i grabbed my binoculars and looking at the light i saw a large "crown" shaped object in the blue white light. crown shaped as in a cylinder open on the top and bottom in which i could see into the interior from the bottom. the cylinder was standing on end so to speak and i could see up through it to a row of pinkish red lights on the bottom interior side which seemed to be in a "tiara" or filigree of the structure of the object. which gave it an upside-down crown like appearance. open top, open bottom, with subtle reds, blues, blacks and whites. on the top, the opening appeared in a dome like blue white aura with a spear or spike of light that just went up sharply. on the bottom with the lights inside and structures there was no doming effect but a fairly clear view of the interior of the cylinder, kind of golden\reddish pink with blues, with a spear of light extending out farther than on the light on top. it reminded me of the gulf breeze florida pictures but alive right there in the sky. i asked one of the camp ground hosts if he had seen anything and he had not.
Summary: a single brilliant object appeared approx. 70 degrees overhead as a blue white "casper" ghost shape. with binoculars it was a on end hollow cylinder.
